general: Today, the stars favor your creativity and charisma. The Moon in sextile with Jupiter encourages you to shine and express yourself with confidence. Take advantage of this energy to showcase your unique talents.
love: Dare to express your feelings; your partner will be receptive.
work: Do not fear taking bold initiatives at work; your leadership will be appreciated.
health: Take the time to meditate or engage in a relaxing activity to balance your energies.
advice: Let your inner light shine today.
teaser: Shine like never before today, Leo!
